title: 二叉树中和为目标值的路径 (二叉树中和为目标值的路径)
content: 思路: // @Title: 二叉树中和为目标值的路径 (二叉树中和为目标值的路径) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-02-21 13:57:26 // @Runtime: 1 ms // @Memory: 41.6 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for a binary tree node. * public class TreeNode { * int val; * TreeNode left; * TreeNode right; * TreeNode() {} * TreeNode(int val) { this.val = val; } * TreeNode(int val, TreeNode left, TreeNode right) { * this.val = val; * this.left = left; * this.right = right; * } * } */ class Solution { public static List<List<Integer>> pathSum(TreeNode root, int target) { if (root == null) { return new ArrayList(); } List<List<Integer>> result = new ArrayList<>(); if (root.left==null&&root.right==null){ if(target==root.val){ result.add(new ArrayList<>()); }else { return new ArrayList(); } } List<List<Integer>> lists = pathSum(root.left, target - root.val); if (lists!=null&&!lists.isEmpty()) { result.addAll(lists); } List<List<Integer>> lists1 = pathSum(root.right, target - root.val); if (lists1!=null&&!lists1.isEmpty()){ result.addAll(lists1); } for (List<Integer> integers : result) { integers.add(0, root.val); } return result; } }
